text:
Hey guys,

is it possible for components in UI-Extensions to set a minwidth because I have a problem that the inputDate field is to small to see it but I don't know how to fix it.

it looks like the first picture but i cannot scroll more to the right to see the dateInput. I have to resize the complete browserwindow lager to see the dateInput like in the second picture. but I want to scroll right and see it like in the second picture.

Hi, I miss the feature to provide fields to my ui-extension. Since we don't have those I decided to use HubDB. All fine so far... I was in need to add the npm project parse5 to my extension. The code works fine in my dev server, but if i deploy it seems to crash if I import/use that module?

Any hint? Are node modules somehow restricted?
Hello, where can I find the docs for building app cards for public app?

I'm trying to enable a feature flag on my account, but the api call fails saying my developer api key is invalid. But, I can use the same  key to deploy my app via CLI. Any ideas which type of key do I need to set feature flags via the api?
The CLI should be configured using a personal access key created during the `init` or `auth` flows, but the API requires a Developer API Key from your app page
Ah I thought it was the same key.
you should have that button "Get HubSpot API key"
